import React from 'react' import './Cartcontent.css' import deleteIcon from '../../images/icon-delete.svg' import product1 from '../../images/image-product-1-thumbnail.jpg' function Cartcontent(props) { // const count= 0 const price = (125.00).toFixed(2) const total =(props.count * price).toFixed(2) console.log(total) return (

Cart

{props.count>=1 ? (

Autumn Limited Edition...

{`$${price} x ${count}`} {` $${total}`}

{props.children}
) : (

Your cart is empty

)}
) } export default Cartcontent
